website_summaries.verdict: A robotic vacuum that makes cleaning the house seem fun.
pros: The bobi Classic comes with touch screen that is responsive and works efficiently
Dust bin is simple to remove and clean
The object and edge sensors prove to work as advertised
The battery life is impressive as well, lasting roughly two hours on a single charge
cons: Struggles with eating loose cords from phones and other electronics

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed with its cleaning pattern, bObi wanders without ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with its cleaning pattern, bObi wanders without a clear pattern, it goes from one area to other without a complete cleaning of the first one. It has problems with furniture, it push chairs (it does not see them) and it jams in other furniture no high or low enough. 17 July- I was disappointed, now I hate it. 28 July- After 5 times used it looks worn out, with dents caused by crashes with furniture. I can not return it because I am in Colombia and it would cost me 150 to 170 US$ to send it back. 5 August- Less than a month of use and battery charge lasts for roughly 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S.

customer_reviews.title: love it. It does not learn the pattern of ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. It does not learn the pattern of room, but for the price difference, 800 compared to 270, I really don't care as long as it cleans for me. It does just that. I'm in love with bobi. Granted I have only had it three days, but it is such a time saver. My floors look great. It doesn't bump into my furniture and it cleans underneath places I have never cleaned unless I move furniture around. The mop feature is bogus though. Does not really mop. It just carries a dust cloth around underneath its carriage. So if you are picking this because you think you won't have to mop, think again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased. Works well with pet hair.  Superlative Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased. Works well with pet hair, in the kitchen, at entrance doors (which tend to have dirt, etc. tracked in on shoes) easy to clean and maintain. Works best on hard surfaces, also works on most of our rugs but doesn't like rugs with fringe on the ends (tries to "eat" the fringe - no surprise there) or on shag-type rugs. . After a year of heavy use, I needed some replacement parts, and had a very favorable experience with Customer Service, excellent service and communication.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schlembach

customer_reviews.title: My reasoning boiled down to the best value available and bobi was it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased bobi after researching robotic vacuums for many months. My reasoning boiled down to the best value available and bobi was it. bobi ran solid for two years and started to have problems. After several attempts to get her fixed via phone support, we decided to send her back to experts at corporate. They tried troubleshooting her but after many failed attempts they decided she wasn't fixable. They sent me a new bobi and it works just like my old bobi did before she got sick. This company stands behind their product and has incredible customer support. Hard to find companies and products as good as this anymore. But I am very happy with my decision to purchase bobi.
customer_reviews.author: Bookfan

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as smart or effective as Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as smart or effective as Roomba. The vacuum path is very random, it doesn't get right up next to walls or furniture due to the sensors, so it always leaves dirt behind. It gets hung up easily on edges or trim, the my old Roomba easily goes over, or avoids all together. I was hoping to like it, but I don't. I am returning and getting another Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Paul III

customer_reviews.title: like having a pet
customer_reviews.text: you have to clean it out completely before each use - it does pick up a lot of dust and hair - the hair gets caught around the moving parts, so most of the time she parks before her charge is depleted - high maintenance, like a pet, she needs cleaned, fed, and directed
customer_reviews.author: PaulaAnne E., Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Highly recommend! Not only is this a great product but the customer service is unlike anything I have experienced and our family is now a customer for life! These days when you want to contact a company you submit an email and wait a week or spend 3 hours following automated instructions over the phone. I wanted to order replacement parts for a piece I lost so I submitted and email for help. Not only did I receive a response the same day the service rep also emailed me to check in more than once to make sure I received what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, effective and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We have our Bobi for two weeks now and we are very excited about her cleaning skills. We have two dogs and so a lot of hairs and dust in the carpet. No problem for bobi - thanks to her very effective brushes she cleans our carpet and wood floor much better than we ourself with our conventional vacuum. A real help to keep our house clean. Since she is really quite too, our dogs lost allscepticsm from the beginning. To achieve the best results we clean her every day, which is quite easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love it, this one is less than half price ...
customer_reviews.text: Bobi is now a part of the family, we have named her Mrs. Hudson in honor of Canada. This is my second robotic Vacuum - but my first bObsweep. I love it, this one is less than half price of my first one of another brand and is a million times smarter and easier to use. I love the remote, I can't believe how easy it is to clean. Keeps the house swept and clean, don't know that it gets every nook and cranny, but I'm not worried about it, Mrs. Hudson can clean tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Seeby Dee

customer_reviews.title: Bobi is now a part of my family!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was solely responsible for vacuuming in my two bedroom apartment, and I hated it! Bobi is extremely helpful! How I do it personally is I lock Bobi in a room until that room is done and then we move onto the next room. I have found this works best! She cleans so well and is so cute!! I literally cannot thank the bobsweep people enough for her. She is quiet enough that she doesn't freak my two cats out either! She sometimes has to gentle nudge them out of the way when cleaning! I had one issue with Bobi and Ian at bobsweep took care of it so quickly it was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Siney

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got this. It worked like a charm for the first year, but the battery gradually failed and now it immediately runs out of battery whenever it leaves its dock. I could charge it for a week straight, and it will still be incapable of going more than 2-3 feet away from its dock before the low battery beep comes on. I now have to vacuum manually again, and bobi has been relegated to a useless conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna N. Eugene

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awful!! It goes all over the house randomly. Never cleans one room fully no matter how long you let I run. It doesn’t matter if it can go up and down rugs, it’s not going to clean them. It is also unable to navigate between chair legs or table legs. Total waste!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to take a moment to let you know that if your Bobi ever has a problem the customer service at Bobsweep is amazing. They are prompt, courteous and will make you literally laugh out loud!! My Bobi unfortunately had a problem with his wheels so he was sent to the hospital where the doctors took very good care of him. They returned him to me looking as good as new and with new brushes and other items too!! My personal Bob consultant, Gabe Aguilera, made this whole process so easy and he has a great sense of humor.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Love our bObi, I bought it for myself for Christmas 2016. Unfortunately while we were gone on vacation, the family that was watching our house allowed their son to push the vacuum like it was a car. This caused one of the wheels to break. Upon calling customer service, they sent out replacement wheels and a video on how to repair it myself (I could have sent her in for repair but after watching the video felt comfortable changing the wheel out myself). Every step of the way my rep from bObi (Thanks Jared Frakes) checked in with me to make sure I was aware of shipping to fixing! She is now fixed and amazing once again!
customer_reviews.author: matt dodge

customer_reviews.title: Nice vac. but not the remote
customer_reviews.text: I like just about everything but the remote.. it’s user unfriendly.. you need the manual to understand it and program anything.. it should have a simple . The Vac is nice and quiet compared to the older models..
customer_reviews.author: @PWG@

customer_reviews.title: Great Auto Vacuum for the price! Suction is strong and lasts for around 2 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning, strong suction to get the fine dirt and animal hairs. My only complaint is that is would hit some spots of the room over and over again and then never hit others that are in an open area. I have a pretty small area it is running it and nothing is obstructing the spots it misses. Running for 2 hours in a small room should hit every spot. For the price though, this vacuum works really well and I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It does appear to have excellent sucking power as I am always amazed on how ...
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum cleaner works as advertised. It does appear to have excellent sucking power as I am always amazed on how much dog hair it is able to pick up from both hard wood and carpeted areas. The battery life is impressive as well. When it is cleaning the pattern will at times seem non-sensical, but given its long battery life if does manage to clean almost all of the nooks and crannies on our 800sqft first floor area.I did have a warrantee issue during which involved faulty vision sensors. I called customer service andtje issue was quickly and transparently addressed with customer service and the product is back to working better than ever. Would recommend this product to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much, I'm need another one!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bobi classic for a few months and I love this thing. My wife and I have two dogs & tile floor in the house, so I picked this up to help with their fur all over the floor. I set it up to run while we're at work and forgot all about it. My wife empties it's dust bin once a week and the rest of the magic happens while we're out of the house. The floors haven't been cleaner and dog fur free!
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap maid !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ever purchased a Robotic Vacuum machine and I really enjoy Bobi. She is doing the job quietly and pretty efficiently. For people having problem with Bobi finding its base to come back for recharge, you need to a a flat surface sitting against a solid background so Bobi can dock rightly (I used tape to hold the base's back tight against the wall). Programming to do the daily task is a little confusing.
customer_reviews.author: isleepwalk

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum is fun to use
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is fun to use. It does have difficulty finding its charging station if you have multiple rooms instead of one open space. It did fall down the stairs though they said it senses then and will not go down. It does a general vacuum; you still need to use a stronger vacuum every week or two to get up the deeper dirt on a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it much
customer_reviews.text: It cleans quietly, it finds recharging station most of the time, but it goes over the same spots many times and it leaves others untouched. It's no substitute for a human guided vacuum cleaner. Also, it takes me 15 minutes to clean the dirt container, disassemble it, wash it and put it together again. Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Norat

customer_reviews.title: Cleans about 10% of a room
customer_reviews.text: It barely cleaned at all, only covering a very small fraction of the room before it stopped. Even after running it 4-5 times, a single room was not completely clean and I had to finish with my vacuum (which is wayyy faster). Luckily, the seller refunded me after I returned it. I have no idea how others got it to actually work, but no such luck for me.
customer_reviews.author: Slug

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my bObi Classic vacuum. I had it for two years now and is still running great! I have three dogs and it does a good job keeping the pet hair cleaned up. I did just get the battery replaced and am very pleased with the customer service I received. I worked with Bryan Nguyen via email and he was super helpful and friendly. I received my replacement battery promptly. I am a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Awful product and experience  with seller
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed in this product. Was too heavy, too bulky, and noise level was distracting. A very small cloth was their version of washing the floor, about the size of the outline of my palm. Seller would not receive back. Refused my return request. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with bObi
customer_reviews.text: Periodically would leave small piles of dirt though I cleaned the unit after each use. Did not maneuver well from tile to carpet or around table and chair legs. I found it unsatisfactory for my house. Edge brush came off after a couple of uses. Extra screws were included in the goodie bag. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nubbers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Bobi for about two weeks now and its has proven to be a great addition. Set up was extremely easy, was able to get it running in less than 15 mins. Bobi is fairly quiet and does a good job cleaning. First time using a robotic vacuum and it has so far surpassed my expectations. I really like that it has a UV light attachment to sterilize the floor and the "waffle mode” has been useful for when i have a small spill. Would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for its price. Love the color options that you don't get with many of the competitors. It has been doing great cleaning my apt for 2 years. I had a battery issue which the customer service was able to fix quickly. Would highly recommend this product. Even though the machine is small to enough to get under my couch and other corners, there have been incidents where Bobi pushed over the floor lamps and fans. Also, there is no indicator when the dust bin is full.
customer_reviews.author: Kavitha

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead make life easier, let the machine do the work.
customer_reviews.text: What I understand Canadian version of the Roomba. Vacuums really well. Has great features at a good price. Sometimes I use it just to play with the remote control function. Only take away I can see is it only has a sweep brush on the right side, and doesn't always get the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Valdar76

customer_reviews.title: What a joy to have in any home!
customer_reviews.text: bObi's probably my new best friend, and I'm thankful to have her around in my home! My roommate, whom I love dearly, sheds hair like there's no tomorrow. We don't have any pets, but our floors Fortunately, bObi's come to the rescue! She's so much fun to watch (and just as functional even when we're not paying attention). The space bObi roams is pretty cozy (read: small), but she still does a phenomenal job of cleaning around tight spaces on our hardwood floors. We'll have cords lying around, but bObi hasn't chewed any up (as of this review). She's mostly quiet, and for a vacuum, isn't intrusive at all. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bote

customer_reviews.title: we've enjoyed it and can't wait for technology like this to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap compared to other brands. The logic used to clean a room is rather simple (it moves forward until encountering an object, backs up, turns, and tries again). This often leads to it being unable to successfully navigate an entire room while staying in the same area for a relatively long time. You get what you pay for. For what it is, we've enjoyed it and can't wait for technology like this to improve.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Great product. User friendly. Sweeps and picks up all particles which are likely to get airborn. With uv light at bottom sanitise flòor surface. Senses drop and does not falldown on stair.sweeps all corners and hardcto reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Yogesh N. Badiani

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner at a great price. My floors are punished daily by four kids & a dog who are constantly littering food crumbs, tracking in dirt, pet hair, and other miscellaneous debri. BObi handles & maneuver it all powerfully and quietly, making my floors manageable until the next deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kassaundra

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY SATISFIED CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bobi vacuum cleaner and mop in March of this year have had only one small problem which was quickly resolved by a gentleman by the name of Jared Frakes at bobsweep. A kind ,considerate very patient man as I am pretty illiterate on a computer and took like an hour of his time to help me.I have the Roomba 650 also .The Bobi is a much more efficient and quieter machine . satisfied and happy customer. Thank you Bobsweep staff. Morris Chadwick
customer_reviews.author: Very  dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the Bobi, but I like the features of the Neato better. . . I had a Neato it lasted 2 years. It would charge 3 times to finish a space. The Bobi doesn't do that, it only charges once and won't finish a space. I don't know where it's cleaned and where it hasn't? Still glad to have a robot vacuum. The 'mop' feature is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: We love Bobi! Sweeps better than I could imagine
customer_reviews.text: We love Bobi! Sweeps better than I could imagine. The multiple brushes seem to help pick up everything. We have a lot of hair in our house so I have to clear it from the brushes often but it's worth it. After almost a year we noticed Bobi wasn't cleaning for as long or as well so we contacted customer service and they helped us to troubleshoot and eventually sent us a new battery and charging unit which was thankfully covered under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Intrinity Book LLC

customer_reviews.title: ... company is spending in order to make the customer happy. My bObi hat a little issue with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by the effort this company is spending in order to make the customer happy. My bObi hat a little issue with the left wheel after a week and customer service was amazing. They helped me to find a temporary solution and offered me a new one in exchange. Which wasn't even needed since it is working since then again. bObi is doing an amazing cleaning job in "easy" rooms. Our kitchen is a bit of a challenge though since the bump sensors do not recognize the kitchen cabinets. It is fun to watch it though. It is a bit like having a little child :-)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: The bObsweep has been wonderful addition to our family since I purchased it 3 weeks ago. My bObsweep amazingly found a way to get under our China hutch and console. These are areas which are very difficult to clean by hand but bObsweep gets under these items easily and gets the job done. Customer service has been excellent thus far also. They responded quickly to my request for additional screws which hold the side brush in place (one came out while bObi was working and somehow got lost). I look forward to using bObi for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. BOELTER

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Just wow; & NOT in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I've never been SO disappointed with a purchase, especially a $300 purchase! I've owned 2 Roomba's & 1 Scooba (Roomba's "mop"...but better). I was excited to be getting an "all in one" floor cleaner. SO. NOT. The "mop" is this thin piece of material that you wet with water or the cleaner of your choice. THIS is NOT a mop. I could go on and on, but to call this a mop is ridiculous, to say the least. The Bobi didn't pick up as expected. I have hardwood everywhere and well, this just didn't do it for me. If I could have given it a half or zero stars, I TOTALLY would have.
customer_reviews.author: kim somewhere in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BOBI
customer_reviews.text: bObi rocks my world. PERIOD. I can't explain how much I love this vacuum. It's been almost two years since I moved in to my own apartment, and I instantly transformed into this "everything must be clean or I will stress the heck out" monster. I went through the KonMari method, heck I went extreme and dove into minimalism, and she just ties it all together. I love the design, so simple and sleek. She's quiet and efficient. During Christmas I was worried she'd eat our tree skirt - no such thing, worked around it like a boss. Keep cables off the floor, though! She's a tough little sucker.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great robotic vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bObi for a couple weeks now and I'm very pleased with it's vacuuming ability, especially for vacuuming cat hair that gets all over my carpets. I have dark hardwood and light carpeted floors and it handles both surfaces equally well. It gets stuck on my thick bathroom rug, but otherwise has no problems navigating different rooms and returning to its docking station. It's very easy to program for regularly scheduled cleanings. My favorite feature is the waffle mode where the bObi will thoroughly clean in one small area. This mode was very useful for cleaning up tiny pieces of a broken wine glass. Overall it's a great a little robotic cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: No Good.
customer_reviews.text: The second star is only cause it does a decent job of actually picking up dirt. The rest is bad news. It pushes my furniture around all over the house it runs into my recliner and just keeps going, spinning the tires the entire time. it supposedly has 80 sensors. well i dont know what its sensing. I will post a video if i get time.
customer_reviews.author: Jerron M., Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Good for Hairy Guys
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a really hairy dude and I have white floors. The combo means I have to vacuum every 2 days or there will be a layer of hair all over my floor. Enter Bobsweep. Now when I bring a lady over, I don't have to worry about it because he took care of it before I even got back home. Plus it's also a great conversation starter when Bobi is cleaning your home as guests are over. You're the best wingman ever Bobi!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for people allergic to dust and poor design!
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite allergic to dust so I've been saving up for a robot vacuum and couldn't be happier with my bObi. The cleaning tools she comes with really help with maintaining her too. I also work as a designer, so I was very happy to find that I didn't have to compromise on design with bObi :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: im not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: im not happy at all, the irobot is better than this, I have the irobot now for 7 years and it is working very well. I bought this because I thought this is better than irobot, when I'm using it in the room after 5 minutes it suddenly shifted to charging, and then pressing the go after 1 round it will go back to charging again.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Ali

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted 1 year and costs $70
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted 1 year and costs $70. Was ok. Would work best for open floorplan w/o tons of furniture. It simply never went into some of our rooms. Also, couldn't find it's charging station. Update: Contacted bobi who took care of battery minus shipping even though just outside of warranty. Extra star for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Clower

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty quiet. I love it for the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the robot vacuum cleaner on my carpet floor, it works well. It's pretty quiet. I love it for the fact that it can go under the bed. It does sometimes tend to stay around the same area as other reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: I-am-Q

customer_reviews.title: A Best Buy/ Must Have for any house with Pets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought bObi as a gift and we use it everyday! The vacuum side of it is awesome and picks up anything from dog hair to chewed up pine cones that my dogs sneak inside! The mop on it is not very practical and could have been designed better so if this is the main selling point to you I would rethink it. If you want a reliable, well built, robot vacuum I would suggest getting a bObi, for the price and quality you certainly wont find a better product. As a plus their customer service is excellent and responded to any question I had within a couple hours at most.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Does a great job cleaning, manuevering, and has lots of nice programmable option. Great value for the $!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Its been great so far. It does get stuck under the couch sometimes and some of the cleaning brush has started to come off, but that's probably because my floors were very dirty. So far I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Bobi>Rumba
customer_reviews.text: This robovac is awesome. Its super quiet (my cats follow it around), it goes on both my short carpet and hardwood easily, and set is pretty easy! The only part that hasn't worked well is that it gets stuck on the fringes of one of my rugs, which is pretty typical for something like this. It cleans my 700 square foot apartment great!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: bObi Pet joined our household a couple years ago. She is awesome since I love sitting on the couch & watching her work! Gustavo Paredes in the Customer Service dept was so helpful with the warranty when her battery needed replacement! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, especially on hardwood/tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper works well. It does a good job sweeping hard floors. The mop is less effective than the sweeper. I don't care for it on carpet because it moves in a random pattern and leaves a crazy pattern on the carpet. If you have a short shag, it would probably work well. It is responsive to the remote and the battery life is long. It is easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Perigo

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweeper, I run it on timer every two days, it cleans up the hair from my two dogs. Warning! If you have a pet who is not fully house broken, make sure you're awake when bObi is scheduled to run. That was not a fun day!
customer_reviews.author: Hainesy5

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it's a time saver and so helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Bobi for 3 days and already it's made my life easier. It now does my daily vacuum job for me! It saves me from back pain and gives me back 20-30 mins of my life. It picks up dirt and pet hair so well that my husband had to ask if the bObi actually did it or if I still vacuumed after it! I love it because it's a time saver and so helpful with all the functions it comes with. We can't wait to test out the mopping function and will update this review as necessary. You can't beat the value for the price point you pay. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We had a bobi before and it had lots of problems this one is great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Asia1dub

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum we bought for our friends as a house ...
customer_reviews.text: great vacuum we bought for our friends as a house warming gift. They have had problems with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Life-Changing Robo-Vac
customer_reviews.text: This bObi has seriously changed my life. Never again will I return to a traditional vacuum cleaner. Not only does the bObi clean just as well if not better than any handheld vacuum cleaner I have ever used, but its also just tons of fun! Easy to use, no assembly required, and tons of fun-I just wish I had one of these in my life sooner. For everyone else in the market for a vacuum, I HIGHLY recommend making the switch to bObi ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great job at going under the furniture
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that when I bought it I thought it was not really necessary because I have a relatively small apartment. I left it working the other day while I went out for dinner and checked the dust bin when I came back. I was so surprised to see all that was in the dust compartment; I had broom the floors and washed some of them just a week before. I live alone and have no pet. Such a great job at going under the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: bObi is not very useful. You have to move him around a lot
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have several rugs or a few rooms. bObi is not very useful. You have to move him around a lot.. his battery dies pretty fast.. Honestly not what I expected. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Tlepshev

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love bObi! I have two dogs and I originally ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love bObi! I have two dogs and I originally purchased for dog hair clean up. My floors are always clean and bObi is so easy to use, as well as empty after cleaning. I’ve also been very satisfied with customer service. I recommend bObi to friends all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is extremely effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this vacuum for a few days now, and while it was somewhat difficult to set up, it is extremely effective and easy to use. I am an obsessive vacuumer and now I can just hit "go" and the bobsweep goes to work. It is so easy, almost never gets stuck, and slowly but surely covers every inch of my apartment. I can watch tv for 30 minutes and when I look at the floor it's immaculate. I really love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love her, my cats love her, and so do my friends!
customer_reviews.text: Strangely adorable. So glad to finally own one of these things. bObi zips around my home all day while I'm away and I must say that i can notice the difference she makes. I no longer see a layer of dust on the floor when the sun comes through the window. Also, my cats are each in love with bObi.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this instead of a roomba and man am I satisfied. The shipping was incredibly fast. The box and opening experience pretty much sums it up. Simple and cool. Easy to operate and clean. I took off a start because the mop function isn't the greatest and because the dustbin could be a little easier to change
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper rather than a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bobi for about 1 1/2 weeks. I have ran it everyday in my living room/kitchen/dining room that has carpet, tile, and area rugs. I decided to vacuum my carpet today with my regular upright vacuum as a test. Unfortunately it picked up just as much dirt and hair as it usually does before using Bobi. Bobi is more of a tidy up sweeper rather than a vacuum. I am undecided whether or not it is worth the cost and maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: so I do love that!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I was going to be a bit more powerful than it actually is, nor is the mop as efficient as I thought. The charger and bobi unsync quite often as well. But all in all, it vacuums while I do other things, so I do love that!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Squires

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Description
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The remote is a bit confusing at first, but once you read the manual and get it working, everything is simple and makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it for sure does not know where to go. keeps on going back and forth in the same spot over and over. I have to be there to use the remote to maneuver it around the room. what a waist of money and time. there star for the power of vacuuming the dirt
customer_reviews.author: wafa

customer_reviews.title: My floors have never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It is so nice to always have clean floors. It is great with carpet and linoleum. I have both in my apartment and it clens both with no problem. It isn't loud like traditional vacuums and its refreshing to not have to deal with cords etc. For a change. Would definitely recommend to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Carole A Ostergren

customer_reviews.title: Picks up the dust
customer_reviews.text: Picks up the fine dust. Tries to get plant leaves and moves the bird cages are the only complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Booker

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bobi robot vacuum! As long as I get cords and small objects out of the way in every room, I can let Bobi vacuum around while I get other chores down around the house. It's saved me so much time!! I still vacuum with a regular vacuum when I want a deep clean, but Bobi's all I need to maintain a clean floor. Comes with a remote control and you can set a timer so it'll vacuum while you're out. Easy to operate and clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Saori

customer_reviews.title: I really like that it goes from carpet to tile floors with ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is a time saver. It does all the work for me. I really like that it goes from carpet to tile floors with no problem. It is also very easy to take apart and clean the smaller parts, or remove hair that gets stuck on the bristles. Really easy to assemble. AND it looks for the charger on its own. You don't have to grab it and plug it in. Call me lazy but I like that it literally does everything for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost 2 years now and going strong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa V.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with my bobi! It was shipped out very quickly. I received it in just a few days. I'm glad I got the refurbished one because it seems brand new to me. I have 2 small dogs who shed a lot and it did great! Totally picked up tons of dog hair and dirt. We just let it run while cooking dinner. Also, it's motor was powerful enough to get over the bump into the kitchen. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jill R.

customer_reviews.title: I reccommened this product
customer_reviews.text: It has good suction power and can actually keep up with a heavily shedding dog. However one issue is a lot of hair gets caught into the brushes in addition to the bin which means dumping the bin AND cleaning the brushes. But still takes a lot less than vacuuming. Run time is great the other day I timed it and it ran one hour and seventeen minutes which gave it enough time to cover most of the areas it missed during the first round .
customer_reviews.author: miranda Byrne

customer_reviews.title: The BObi is an amazing bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: The BObi is an amazing bit of kit... just have to put cushions to stop it getting caught under the table leg. It picks up the dogs hairs off the wood flooring with ease and everything else. Also goes over the mats with ease too.. Keeps trying to mount the hearth, eventually gives up. such a strong little thing. If your in the same room its a little noisy. I just leave it to do its thing... and it manages to re dock itself when it needs a charge. Amazing bit of kit would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our wood floors get dusty everyday but bObi cleans perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect bObi to arrive this early. I love it so much!! Was really excited to use it & it works great. So cute and pretty too. Don't have any problems w/ this product & its very easy to use. Even my mom made me teach her how to use it so she doesn't have to clean the hardwood floor that we have. Our floor gets so dusty everyday & bObi cleans it right off. She especially Loves the mop that bObi has... no more stains!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. I have a golden lab that sheds all year around. I used to have to vacuum twice a day to stay on top of the fur balls that would pile up around the house. Now I don't even need to worry about it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great household help
customer_reviews.text: I bought bobi a year ago and I am more than happy with the purchase. She helps with the cleaning every day and she does amazing job on hard floor as well as on rug. She has no trouble finding the charging station. At the beginning she had some problems with our round stairs but together with really helpful service we solved this problem. The service guys are really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's great at getting under the furniture
customer_reviews.text: It's a handy vacuum but doesn't do well at picking up pet hair in carpet. I still have to vacuum the rug daily, but it's great at getting under the furniture. Which is an area that would normally not be vacuumed as often.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Most of the time it's just going in circles and at this point I can't even get off the docking station. Don't buy look for a Nother product
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bObi for a few months now, and have been using it a few times a week. I'm still amazed every time! I have a very sheddy dog, and bObi manages to get in all of the nooks and crannies I wouldn't be able to reach otherwise. It's very easy to use, and it's so intelligent, it even finds its way back to its charging station when it's done. I couldn't live without it now, and my only regrets are that I didn't get it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned him one day, but so far I'm in love! The mop pad dries way too fast, so I'm disappointed in the mopping feature, but he cleans well in the corners with vacuuming and overall does a pretty thorough job. And for everything he does, the price is very reasonable. Still worthy of 5 stars for me 👍
customer_reviews.author: jo anna henscheid

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much, only the mopping is not effective You have to clean it every two times of full home cleaning Pros: easy to clean Able to catch all tiny dirts and falling hair :-) Just operate it (press Go!) and forget about it Cons: you have to remove stuffs and dirts of bigger size as traditional vacuums before operating bobi the mopping is not effective, small and thin not enough to mop even a small room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long hair broke it
customer_reviews.text: After a year of having it my girlfriends hair got wrapped around the brushes and stopped it from working :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable options ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago and the product is A1 never had any trouble with the Bobi Classic and everyhing was shipped correctly using the original box and offering additional papers for any upcoming technical assistance or parts replacement. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable options for a Robotix Vacuum Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value one important negative
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money One of the 2 clips broke and the other may be fatigued I am concerned since such a simple clip is essentiol to the the vacs operation. i am the only one who runs it so it has not been abused
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: We love our bObi!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bObi for the past few weeks. It does a great job handling the dust that accumulates in our one bedroom apartment. One of my favorite features is the manual control option. With manual options available, I can send bObi into more specific and targeted locations. My floors have been noticeably cleaner since bObi arrived, and underneath the sofas and bed are now spotless! bObi has been a great addition to the apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Service from Bobsweep.
customer_reviews.text: 2/2017 My bObi was acting in an erratic manner and the charge was not lasting as long as it had so I returned it to Bobsweep for a check up. It was returned with a clean bill of health and is again saving my sanity since I do run it daily, sometimes more, in different areas. The electronic board and battery were replaced. A representative from Bobsweep contacted me to ascertain if the repairs were effective. I am thrilled with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!!! Works seamlessly on my wood floors, carpets, and rugs. It is low to the ground and it has an easy time going under and between the furniture. It is able to go places I couldn’t get with a regular vacuum cleaner. Cleans well and saves me time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is too flimsy and breaks easily. After one year of very light use, it would not recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Shari R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: bObi is a fantastic addition to any living room
customer_reviews.text: bObi is a fantastic addition to any living room, bedroom, or bathroom. Assembly of bObi was easy, all we had to do was insert the brush and unpack her from the plastic wrapping. Battery life is very strong, and the remote is easy to figure out how to use by just trial and error. The programming feature is also fantastic, you can practically use bObi as an alarm clock, though she is much quieter than a manual vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling clean house is so easy now
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bObi Robotic Vacuum Cleaner. I turn it on every night while doing my dishes and I am so happy that before going to bed my house is sparkling clean. It cleans from all the corners and cleans my tiles as well as wooden surface including my area rug. It goes below the dining table and cleans the mess my kids make during dinner time. I highly recommend bObi.
customer_reviews.author: SapnaS

customer_reviews.title: Bobi is just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased Bobi over a year ago and are happy with our purchase. Bobi performs extremely well, and is easy to use. The only negative is that Bobi runs hard into black furniture. However, we love Bobi so much that we have purchased additional Bobi’s to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: david ohr

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great for the busy.
customer_reviews.text: This little robo vacuum surpassed my expectations. It was surprisingly easy to set up and did such a great job picking up all the tracked in dirt and dog fur. I usually try and do a full vacuum sweep with my Dyson at least once a week, but with life being as hectic as it is, that has fallen by the wayside. This little guy will definitely make cleaning much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy people
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on hardwood floors! Great for me as I'm pretty much out of the house all day- being able to pre-schedule Bobi to clean at the certain times of the day has been a huge time-saver. Plus, it does a pretty great job, especially on tile, which is impossible to sweep between the cracks, and getting to those hard to reach places like under the bed. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: We were awed by this little vacuum. It worked for an hour on the charge straight out of the box. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: hairless and happy
customer_reviews.text: i love my bobi! not only is she adorable to watch, but she's easy to use! i live in an apartment with 2 other girls, and our hair is constantly everywhere! carpet, tile... its a nightmare. our regular stick-and-suck vacuum never seemed like it collected all the hair, but bobi has picked up every single strand. walking around barefoot has never felt so sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Alejandrino

customer_reviews.title: Great product! bObi is so useful for a busy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! bObi is so useful for a busy college student. It's quiet and I'm able to use the scheduled to run during the day. I had a great experience with customer service! My package didn't come with a manual but I received one from bObsweep right away. I've recommended bObi to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 80-year old Grandmother. She is starting to get used to it but so far... very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tippins

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks. Now it runs but isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks. Now it runs but isn't picking anything up. Called CS and they were not much help.
customer_reviews.author: jen

product_meta.title: bObi Classic Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Snow
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteSay farewell to dust balls when you adopt bObi, a robot vacuum with over 80 sensors and just three touchscreen buttons. Press GO! and bObi will zip through your house picking up pet hair and scraps, while WAFFLE lets her focus on just a small area. If you’re too tapped out to give commands, you can easily schedule a cleaning routine so she starts up automatically.
feature_bullets: Soft touch sensors for bumper-less navigation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars738 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Empty dustbin, clean brush & wash mop rag after each use
specifications.Included Components: Remote Control included, Charging Station included, Charging Adapter included, Batteries included
